data.title: Beats Academy
data.text:
Who can apply?

Students currently enrolled in a 2 or 4-year program at a college/university (inclusive of undergraduate, graduate, trade, and working professional programs) with an interest in creating branded social content.

What is the program duration?

Beats Academy will take place over an 8-week period from August 24, 2024 to October 18, 2024. Public holidays will be recognized.

Is this a paid opportunity?

Students will be paid a competitive stipend for their time and creative output throughout the program.

How many creators will be selected?

14 students will be selected to participate in Beats Academy.

What makes Beats Academy a fit for me?

You're a student who desires the opportunity to work directly with experienced marketing professionals to create social content featuring college athletes for Beatsâ€™ social channels.

Is this program virtual or in-person?

Beats Academy is a hybrid program. Up to two (2) sessions per week will be conducted via Webex with occasional in-person sessions held in Culver City. Additional in-person sessions will include the kickoff event, a film shoot on a weekend, and a program wrap party. Students must have access to transportation to the Los Angeles and Culver City areas.

If I am selected, what is the expected level of commitment?

Throughout the 8-week program, participants will be expected to dedicate up to five (5) hours per week for workshops and group sessions on weekdays, as well as an additional two (2) full days (on a weekend) for an orientation and the film shoot.

Who will be leading this program?

Students will receive mentorship and learnings from professionals at Beats and UnitedMasters Translation.
